entry.title: Taproot NACK
entry.summary: The email thread is a discussion on the topic of Taproot NACK. LORD HIS EXCELLENCY JAMES HRMH expresses his concern that complex scripts allow obfuscation of the Pay To address. In response, Ryan Grant argues that this is no different from options available in P2SH or generating a new address for a payment. Damian A. James Williamson, representing Willtech and other projects, provides additional advice on P2SH's scrutability once the UTXO is spent and plausible reduction in transaction linkage when creating new addresses. The email concludes with disclaimers that it does not constitute general advice and should be disregarded if misdelivered.
